mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1957
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First row (l to r): Noel Martin Rowan, Charles Baynham Mahon, James Trigg Gillespie, John Iverson Boswell, William Swadley Erwin, Jr., Henry Wayne Poore, Julian Arthur Koplen, Robert Lee Glenn, Marvin Miles Sager, Faith Hilda Kung, Francis Edwards Rushton, James Robert Hicks II, John Roger Casey, William Thomas Carter, Edgar Clifford Lawson, Charles Richard Chamberlain, Jr. Second row (l to r): John Loomis Chamberlain III, Warren Woodson Koontz, Jr., Alexander Farish Robertson III, Mark Henderson Congdon, Edward Joseph Armbruster, Robert Walter Olwine, Julius Conn, Jr., Peter Van Cortlandt Moore, Edward Thomas Wood, David L. Lewis, Loyd Clarence Brannon, George Bluford Naff, John Orton Shaw, Tureman Gayle Weaver. Third row (l to r): William Carter Lowe, George Allan Ferre, Martin Perlman William Lloyd Meehan, Howard Nan Stewart, Robert Barksdale Ooghe, Allan Lee Drash, Wilford Wayne Spradlin, Frederick Carr Davis, Jr., Leif Oscar Torkelson, Phillip Morton Levy, Macon Smiley Couk, William Sidney Foreman, Jr., James Hawver McVey, John Jefferson Lund. Fourth row (l to r): Howard Mortye Vinecour, Charles Henry Gleason, Jess Peck Piller, Donald Raymond Cagle, Robert Francis Baxter, Charles Penick Olinger, Edward Bertram Nash, Cyrus Patrick Lewis, Gwendolyn Rosalie Hogan, John Wesley Emerick, Jr., Theron Rice Rolston, Jr., Haakon Ragde, Edmund Roland Weise, Joseph Hodges Fitzgerald, William Mayo Oppenheimer, William Turkington Clarke. Fifth row (l to r): Bruce Alexander Talmadge, Stuart Horsley Harris, Jr., John Robert Talbert, George Walker Sommers, Jr., James Edwin Patterson, Hugh Richard Howell, Luke Combs, Joseph Emory Coleman, Hobart Garfield Hansen, Jr., Lockhart Bemiss McGuire, Edward Joseph Sheridan, Jr., Charles Reames Young, James Parker Cross, Jr., George Ely Walker.
